artist: Artist: Toyohara Kunichika; Publisher: Kiya Sōjirō; Carver: Ōta Masukichi
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: red-skinned man wearing brown, grey, green and purple plaid kimono; grey ground; right sheet of a triptych
markings: carver seal: 彫工舛吉 {Horikō Masukichi}; censor seal: 卯八改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Right sheet of a triptych related to the play Honchō nijūshikō 本朝廿四孝, performed at the Nakamura Theater in the 8th lunar month of 1867.
title: Actor Arashi Kichisaburō IV as Yokozō
